heading: HR00370
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON ECOLOGY AND OTHER APPROPRIATE COMMITTEES, TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE PROPRIETY OF COLLECTING FEES TO DISCOURAGE THE USE OF PLASTIC BAGS FOR SHOPPING IN CERTAIN RETAIL ESTABLISHMENTS WITH THE END IN VIEW OF ALIGNING THE FEES TO ITS PROFESSED PURPOSE AND ENACTING LEGISLATION TO REGULATE THE SAME
principal-authors: PINEDA, ENRICO A.; ROMERO, MICHAEL ODYLON L., Ph.D.;
status: Pending with the Committee on ECOLOGY since 2016-11-14

House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00370
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON ECOLOGY AND OTHER APPROPRIATE COMMITTEES, TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE PROPRIETY OF COLLECTING FEES TO DISCOURAGE THE USE OF PLASTIC BAGS FOR SHOPPING IN CERTAIN RETAIL ESTABLISHMENTS WITH THE END IN VIEW OF ALIGNING THE FEES TO ITS PROFESSED PURPOSE AND ENACTING LEGISLATION TO REGULATE THE SAME
